            /* The Ripped Effect - Top and Bottom */
            .film-rip {
                clip-path: polygon(

                    0% 20px,

                    100% calc(100% - 20px),

                    97% calc(100% - 5px), 94% calc(100% - 20px), 91% calc(100% - 2px), 88% calc(100% - 22px),

                                    </div>

                                        ${item.desc}
                                    </p>

                                </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>`;
                    container.innerHTML += html;
                });
            }

            // --- SCROLL EFFECT ---
            document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
                const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
                    entries.forEach(entry => {
                        if(entry.isIntersecting) {
                            entry.target.classList.remove('opacity-50', 'blur-[2px]');
                            entry.target.classList.add('opacity-100', 'blur-0');
                        } else {
                            entry.target.classList.add('opacity-50', 'blur-[2px]');
                            entry.target.classList.remove('opacity-100', 'blur-0');
                        }
                    });
                }, { root: null, threshold: 0.55, rootMargin: "-10% 0px -10% 0px" }); 
                document.querySelectorAll('.strip-frame').forEach(f => observer.observe(f));
            });

             // --- MENU ---
            const btn = document.getElementById('menu-toggle');
            const overlay = document.getElementById('menu-overlay');
            if(btn) btn.addEventListener('click', () => { overlay.classList.toggle('opacity-0'); overlay.classList.toggle('pointer-events-none'); });
        </script>
